pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 16, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet briefly with a Kentucky business delegation.

Closed to media

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.  

Note for media:

    • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
